Class.name: CSPX.Dashboard.Spacer
Class.Description:
Spacer meter for Ensemble Dashboard.
A spacer does not display any thing; it is simply used to take up space in the dashboard for layout purposes.

Parameter.name: SHOWLABEL
Parameter.Description: Should this meter display the standard label

Parameter.name: MINWIDTH
Parameter.Description: Minimum width, in logical units, of this meter.

Parameter.name: MINHEIGHT
Parameter.Description: Minimum height, in logical units, of this meter.

Parameter.name: WIDTH
Parameter.Description: Default width, in logical units, of this meter.

Parameter.name: HEIGHT
Parameter.Description: Default height, in logical units, of this meter.

Method.name: OnSVGScript
Method.Description: Draw the script section of this SVG meter
